defined_text = {
	name = MEC_Expeditions_Decision_Event_Info
	random = no

	text = {
		localisation_key = MEC_Expeditions_Decision_Event_Info_undiscovered
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_discovered = FROM
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = MEC_Expeditions_Decision_Event_Info_uncolonized
		trigger = {
			is_empty = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = MEC_Expeditions_Decision_Event_Info_colony
		trigger = {
			is_colony = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = MEC_Expeditions_Decision_Event_Info_owned
		trigger = {
			always = yes
		}
	}
}
